name: Okonomiyaki (Japanese Pancake)
author: Stephanie Llamas
summary: Okonomiyaki is a Japanese pancake stuffed with yummy goodness! 'Okonomi' means what you like and 'yaki' means grilled. The ingredients provided are the basic okonomiyaki recipe. Feel free to add any vegetables or other meats. Have fun playing with the ingredients!
ingredients: 1  sausage, diced, or more to taste  (Optional)
1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or to taste
1 tablespoon panko bread crumbs, or to taste
directions: Mix flour and water together in a bowl until smooth
Stir in cabbage, bacon, eggs, sausage, green onions, shrimp, cheese, and tenkasu
Preheat a griddle to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C); coat with oil
Pour in flour mixture in the shape of a pancake
Cook until golden brown, about 6 minutes per side
Mix soy sauce, ketchup, and vinegar together in a small bowl to make okonomiyaki sauce
